name: Sync user & session stats from Google Analytics to Google Sheets
description:
Streamline your data analysis by automatically syncing total users and session data from Google Analytics to Google Sheets every Friday at 17:00. Customize your schedule as needed to keep stakeholders updated with the latest website metrics.
The scenario is scheduled to execute every Friday at 17:00 which you can change in the schedule setting by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
